name: Block Hell Tint
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

A/D - LEFT AND RIGHT to move the blocks

W - UP rotates the block to the left

E - rotates the block to the right

Q - mirrors the block ONLY if it's in the  CENTER of the grid

SPACE - makes the block fall super fast

Your objective is simple, survive as long as you can... Print your score :)

You may find some bugs and other problems, but remember, its a prototype

Also any feedback is welcome!

This game is more or less like a tetris, but it's pieces are different and there are some deck build elements where you choose a new pieces each 2 levels....
